title: New range of CPCB IV+ compliant gensets from Kirloskar Oil Engines - Your Gateway to Power Transmission ... - T&D India
summary: Kirloskar Oil Engines Ltd (KOEL) has launched a new range of CPCB IV+ compliant gensets that are fuel-efficient, high-performance, and environmentally responsible. These gensets meet the latest emission norms set by the Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) and are designed to cater to diverse power requirements across various sectors. The new range of gensets is also IoT-enabled, providing real-time insights, predictive maintenance, and remote monitoring capabilities.
